snippet: Republicans on a House panel said the frequencies should instead be auctioned to telecommunications companies, because that might raise up to $19 billion.
abstract: Republicans on a House panel said the frequencies should instead be auctioned to telecommunications companies, because that might raise up to $19 billion.

headline.main: G.O.P. Balks at Unlicensed Airwaves Plan
